demo.subtitle: This one is harder

real.title: Push to Path
real.subtitle: medium
real.hint: **Fastest Solution:** duplicate template-line down (5x), multicursor-select all `push` with Ctrl+D, 2x(Left), Ctrl+Shift+Home, 2x(Ctrl+Shift+Right), Ctrl+X, move in multicursormode to `'all'`, Ctrl+D to highlight, Ctrl+V
